favourite.article: Lord, may we in Your kingdom live, Fighting for Your interest. May Your recovery, Forward march, spread far and wide. May Your lampstands shine forth, In each city so bright. GTCA 30 cities, 30 golden lampstands, Lord Jesus,for lampstands in each city in every continent on earth: For the Lord's recovery, satisfaction and return.

Lord, gain our hearts. Lord, You are the only one we love. Lord, keep our hearts single and pure to love You and Your church. Lord, increase our love to You. Lord, I LOVE YOU SO MUCH! No one and nothing can replace my love for YOU! AMEN LORD JESUS!
